trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geeft u de methode die wordt afgehandeld tijdens de <xref href="System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving"> </xref> gebeurtenis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving> event occurs just before a group of application settings are persisted, typically during the execution of the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> method of a wrapper class derived from <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving>gebeurtenis treedt op vlak voor een groep van toepassing instellingen blijven bewaard, doorgaans tijdens het uitvoeren van de <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A>methode van een wrapperklasse is afgeleid van <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase>.</xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase> </xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Save%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsSaving>
